text: Ogoh ʙoşed, ki dini xolis [va xolī az şirk] az oni Alloh taolo ast va afrode, ki ƣajri Allohro [dūst va] korsozi xud intixoʙ kardaand [pindoraşon in ast, ki]: «Onhoro faqat ʙa in dalel meparastem, ki moro ʙa Alloh taolo nazdik gardonand [va manzalatamonro ʙeştar kunand]». Alloh taolo dar mavoridi ixtilofaşon mijoni onon [va muvahhidoni rostin] dovarī xohad kard. Be tardid, Alloh taolo kasero, ki durūƣgūi nosipos ʙoşad, hidojat naxohad kard
